title: The Brothers O'Toole (Western, 1973) John Astin, Pat Carroll | Movie, Subtitles

sources.title: The Brothers O'Toole (Western, 1973) John Astin, Pat Carroll | Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
The brothers, a couple of ne'er-do-wells, turn a sleepy mining town upside-down in their search for quick riches.

Original title: The Brothers O'Toole (1973)

This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Richard Erdman
Writers: Marion Hargrove, Tim Kelly
Stars: John Astin, Pat Carroll, Hans Conried 
Genres: Comedy, Western


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:41 A humorous Western film involving family dynamics, deception, and a quest for help in a small town.
09:59 A wild west showdown and arrest unfolds in a small town, involving a notorious criminal and the local sheriff.
16:47 Humorous interactions unfold in a Western town involving a man named O'Toole and various characters.
27:49 A town prepares for a hanging while discussing the upcoming trial and the condemned man.
34:38 A man named Michael is mistaken for his brother, leading to a series of misunderstandings and accusations.
41:25 A humorous Western movie involves a plot to escape from prison and a valuable discovery.
55:14 Legal proceedings in a Western film involve accusations of bank robbery, assault, and conspiracy, with a defendant represented by a lawyer.
56:43 Legal proceedings involving a bar prisoner, a disruptive witness, and a mysterious financial scandal unfold in a courtroom drama.
1:03:05 Discussions about an idea of opening a potential casino or  a gambling hall causes chaos and excitement in a small town
1:11:38 A simple-looking gunslinger, financial advisor, and a marriage proposal.
1:31:24 A man named O'Toole is urged to marry a girl, while encountering various characters and music performances.
